name: True or False
description:
Your goal is simple: decide whether the statements are true or false. Some of them may seem pretty crazy, but they are true; while other "facts" are actually false.

Is there a chocolate-scented flower? You will soon know the answer!Key Features
  • Over 200 surprising and entertaining facts.
  • Calm and relaxing OST.
  • DRM-free. You can play the game anywhere anytime!
